title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 142.7 - Review of geographic area pay differentials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 142.7 - Review of geographic area pay differentials

State Regulations

The Director of Classification and Compensation may, at his
discretion, review existing geographic area pay differentials with reference to
need or appropriateness and make such changes as may be warranted, subject to
the approval of the Director of the Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
142.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
